pr_title: Add Spawn Confirmations for Towns and Nations with Spawn Costs

timeline.message: add spawn confirmations.
add config option for ignoring spawn warnings.
change default for warnings to true

Merge branch 'master' into feature/spawn-confirmations

# Conflicts:

Make sure town is public before sending confirmation.
Show warning for residents of town/nation.
fixes
Implement new confirmation system, needs work on console.
Generify confirmation holders and finish implementation.
Fix atomic reference
Fix bugs and code formatting issues.
make sure timeout message only shows on an actual timeout.
Confirmations now send confirmations messages automatically.

Removed CommandSender from Confirmation

Only ConfirmationHandler will deal with CommandSender's
Add duration field for Confirmation
fix constructor.

Fix purge command feedback being only seen in console & moved purge
permission test to pre-confirmation.
Fix /t unclaim all showing two confirmations & Fix unwanted refunds.
Remove commented out message.

Merge branch 'refactor/confirmation-overhaul' into feature/spawn-confirmations
